DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to investigate if the genetic variant CYP2C19*17 affects the pharmacokinetics of proguanil and clopidogrel.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of CYP2C19*17 on the Pharmacokinetics of Proguanil and Clopidogrel
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers Written consent Age 1865 CYP2C19*1 and or CYP2C19*17 genotype. Daily medication Alcohol abuse Pregnancy Breastfeeding
